description:
Not too big and not too small, Hultafors’ standard camping hatchet is ready to feed your fires, clear your trails and be the workhorse of your campsite. The ergonomic hickory haft (axe-talk for handle) is comfortable in your hand and provides excellent mechanical advantage. Known all over the world for quality craftsmanship, a Hultafors axe will serve your family for generations.

  • Ironwork head features a clear lacquer to ward off corrosion
  • Head hung using a standard eye to haft mount, making it easy to replace the haft (as this head will outlast the handle)
  • Heat-treated axe head is softer towards the handle and harder along the edge
  • Tough hickory haft provides a surprising amount of mechanical advantage for its size
  • Classic linseed oil finish on the hickory haft
  • Handsome leather sheath protects your hatchet’s edge
  • Hultafors axe heads feature a lifetime warranty
name: Hultafors Standard Camping Hatchet
